original_title: Great Opera Singers - Gundula Janowitz Rita Streich Tito Gobbi Boris Christoff
overview: GUNDULA JANOWITZ (arias from Der Freischütz and Tannhäuser); RITA STREICH (arias from Gianni Schicchi, Linda di Chamounix, The Marriage of Figaro and Rusalka); TITO GOBBI (arias from Falstaff and Gianni Schicchi); BORIS CHRISTOFF (Boris's death from Boris Godunov); ELISABETH GRÜMMER, ISABEL STRAUSS, ERNEST BLANC (excerpt from Lohengrin); WOLFGANG WINDGASSEN, GOTTLOB FRICK (excerpts from Parsifal) EMI CLASSICS DVD DVB 5996889 (mono) TT: 117:55
title: Great Opera Singers - Gundula Janowitz Rita Streich Tito Gobbi Boris Christoff
